participant_1.name: Alexandra
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, with a passion for storytelling and fantasy.
participant_1.background: I enjoy strong female characters in my movies. I'm not sure my parents would approve of my music hobby, but it's something that I love and it helps me to relax. I am average height, but my family is very tall. I play dungeons and dragons. I do not have a college degree.

participant_2.name: Bjorn
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and nurturing, with a love for family and culinary arts.
participant_2.background: I enjoyed a nice walk outside to appreciate the weather. I love cooking. I am married to another viking descendant and we have many children. I enjoy wearing my cat-eye glasses while training to compete in the Olympics. I visit comic con.

content.text: What do you think of strong female characters in movies?
I love them! They are so inspiring and show girls that they can do anything.
Me too! I love watching movies with strong female characters.
What are your favorite movies with strong female characters?
I love the movie "Wonder Woman". She is such a strong and powerful character.
I love that movie too! She is so inspiring.
I love to cook! I love trying new recipes and experimenting in the kitchen.
That's awesome! I love cooking too. It's so much fun to create something delicious.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes! I love how easy they are to make and how delicious they are.
Pasta is my favorite food! I love it so much.
That would be so much fun
